about_the_game:
You are the Tempest, the Left Hand of the King on a mission to dissolve a conspiracy of wizards. After the War of the Flame, the attempted usurpers scattered throughout the kingdom of Amvros, spreading seeds of corruption.

As the leader of the Crimson Capes, the witch-hunting guild, your first mission is to cleanse a cultist village and deliver justice to the Necromancer leading them. During the events of the story you will discover that there are more sinister powers at play and you will come to understand the true meaning of power.

BLADE IN HAND

Fight with the Montante, using moves based on realistic greatsword fighting tecnhiques. Perform feints, thrusts, cuts and spinning moves to open up your enemies for a fatal hit.

SWORD & SORCERY

Absorb the magical powers of witches and use them for yourself. Harness the winds and command thunder to aid you in your fight. As you gain more experience you can expand on your physical and magical skills.

STEEL MEETS BONE

Take the heads of your enemies, bring them down to their knees for a finishing blow, or spill their insides out. Deliver the Law of the King and make an example out of your enemies.

HIGH ADVENTURE

Raid old ruins and magic towers, climb down dark caverns and explore mystical forests. Magical artifacts are waiting to be discovered in every corner of the world, which you can explore at your own pace and in any order you like.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5, 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1500 MHz, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2000 MHz, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Crimson Capes is a soulslike Action-RPG taking place in a Sword & Sorcery setting. Engage in fluid 2D pixel art swordplay, hunt witches, track monsters and experience the age of high adventure.
